geneticAlogrithm

Class GeneticAlgorithmCall

  • java.lang.Object
    • geneticAlogrithm.GeneticAlgorithmCall

  • public class GeneticAlgorithmCall
extends java.lang.Object

    This is the main Class for the GA.
    It use the Genetic algorithm device provide by the watchMaker's API and the class I redefined for it. See the corresponding doc for more information
    In order to get a clean code, i have divided the big operation in small functions.
    All this methods are called in the function startAlgorithm.

    Version:
    0.1
    Author:
    Pierre-Yves Hervo
    See Also:
    Sequence, SequenceEvaluator, SequenceCrossOver, SequenceFactory, SequenceMutation

    • Field Detail

      • length

        int length
        The length of the sequence we will use. It musn't be modified onces it is set.

      • alphabet

        private GlobalAlphabet alphabet
        The alphabet with all the possible values for the box of a sequence.

      • target

        private FormantSequence target
        The values of the formant in the target

        private SequenceFactory mySequenceFactory
        The sequenceFactory used by the GA

      • pipeline

        The pipeline that allow to use both mutation qnd cross over in the GA, See the watchMaker doc for more information

        private SequenceEvaluator mySeqEval
        The SequenceEvaluation used by the GA

        The Random generator used by the GA

      • engine

        private MyGenerationalEvolutionEngine<Sequence> engine
        The EvolutionEngine used by the GA

      • messageFromPraat

        private FormantSequence messageFromPraat
        The message received From Praat by the server. It is a String so it must be cast by the splitChaineToFormantSequence function
        See Also:
        MessageFromPraat.splitChaineToFormantSequence(String)

      • availablevalue

        private final java.util.concurrent.Semaphore availablevalue
        A mutex to protect the value of messageFromPraat and be sure it is not read and modify in the same time
        See Also:
        messageFromPraat

      • availableFitnessfunction

        private final java.util.concurrent.Semaphore availableFitnessfunction
        A mutex to protect the execution of the fitness function. The goal is to forbid it to be run while the previous execution isnt finished. this is necessary cause of the delay of praat and the GA. So we need to synchronized them this way.
        See Also:
        messageFromPraat

      • finalsequence

        private Sequence finalsequence
        Var to store the best candidate a each generation. This value will be use at he end to write the correct praat script.

      • start

        private long start
        indicate the time at which we launch the algorithm, it is utse to calculate the execution time. initiate in the constructor

      • praatObject

        private Praat praatObject

      • previousGeneration

        private java.util.List<Sequence> previousGeneration

      • getMessageFromPraat

        public FormantSequence getMessageFromPraat()
        Method which return the message from praat store in the instance. It use a mutex to be sure the resource isn't read and write in the same time. It lock the resource at the beginning and release it at the end.
        Returns:
        the formant sequence where the message from praat is store
        Since:
        0.1

      • setMessageFromPraat

        public void setMessageFromPraat(FormantSequence messageFromPraat)
        Method which store the message from praat in the instance. It use a mutex to be sure the resource isn't read and write in the same time. It lock the resource at the beginning and release it at the end.
        Since:
        0.1

      • getMutexFitnessFunction

        public java.util.concurrent.Semaphore getMutexFitnessFunction()
        Return the semaphore for the fitness function. It is used in FitnessEvaluator to forbid the function to be launch twice.
        Returns:
        frequency value of the instance
        Since:
        0.1

        public void setSequence(Sequence c)

      • deleteFile

        public static void deleteFile(java.lang.String file)
        function to delete a specific file. It avoid to keep file which arent usefull. I use it to delete the temp file on wich i work during the run. this script is different from those og the save one with sendsocket wich cause a error once the run is finish and the serveur close.
        Parameters:
        file - the path to the file

        Returns:

      • fitnessMargin

        public int fitnessMargin()
        function wich calculate the margin authorise in the calculation of the formants. it is this value which will be used to determine when to stop the GA.
        Returns:
        the min born for the Genetic algorithm
